video.title: The Job
video.synopsis: Drinking, smoking, pill-popping NYPD detective Mike McNeil's unconventional approach makes him a great cop, but it takes a toll on his personal life.

episodes.synopsis: In the show's premiere episode, detective Mike McNeil is having a tough day trying to juggle the demands of his wife, his girlfriend and his partner.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: Actress and model Elizabeth Hurley is being harassed and all the guys in the precinct want to be assigned to her case.
episodes.title: Elizabeth

episodes.synopsis: All hell breaks loose when Frank's perp escapes and takes McNeil hostage in a precinct bathroom.
episodes.title: Bathroom

episodes.synopsis: A bag with a severed foot is found in front of a doorman building. McNeil secretly does a background check on Jan's new boyfriend.
episodes.title: Foot

episodes.synopsis: McNeil samples the services of a massage parlor to see if it's legit. Jan arrests a homeless man who turns out to be a high-school classmate.
episodes.title: Massage

episodes.synopsis: McNeil attends anger management classes after his ugly altercation with a cab driver is captured on video and broadcast on TV.
episodes.title: Anger

episodes.synopsis: McNeil is less than thrilled when he and Pip are assigned to take the district attorney's 12-year-old daughter on a ride-along for her school paper.
episodes.title: Sacrilege

episodes.synopsis: McNeil, Pip and Jan are assigned to find a missing ballerina and discover that the mystery of her whereabouts may be linked to Frank's favorite soup.
episodes.title: Soup

episodes.synopsis: A telescope taken from a crime scene provides hours of fun for the guys while Frank repeatedly tries to return a dead body to its rightful precinct.
episodes.title: Telescope

episodes.synopsis: Ruben moonlights as a security guard for actress Gina Gershon, and McNeil scams his way onto the job. Jan discovers that Al has a surprising sideline.
episodes.title: Gina

episodes.synopsis: McNeil promises his wife that he'll quit drinking, but he soon discovers the joys of abusing cold medicine.
episodes.title: Quitter

episodes.synopsis: McNeil's suspicion that Frank is gay soon has the whole precinct trying to get Frank "out of the closet.
episodes.title: Gay

episodes.synopsis: McNeil is forced to take a vacation in Miami, but he can't relax because he suspects one of his most wanted fugitives is staying at his hotel.
episodes.title: Vacation

episodes.synopsis: McNeil thinks his neighbor is making moves on his wife, so he assigns Ruben and Al to do surveillance. Tommy and Frank look for Robert De Niro's dog.
episodes.title: Neighbor

episodes.synopsis: McNeil suspects his girlfriend is cheating on him. Frank heads to the track with Tommy to place bets using police department money.
episodes.title: Boss

episodes.synopsis: Frank thinks he has a stalker, but the guy turns out to be his long-lost son. McNeil leaks Jan's personal problems to the other detectives.
episodes.title: Dad

episodes.synopsis: McNeil's girlfriend blackmails him into meeting her parents over dinner. Meanwhile, Jan dates a cop with a secret.
episodes.title: Parents

episodes.synopsis: Pip and his wife celebrate their 25th anniversary with a no-smoking, no-drinking barbecue attended by church friends, the squad, McNeil and his wife.
episodes.title: Barbeque

episodes.synopsis: McNeil's girlfriend threatens to tell his wife about his ongoing infidelity. The department rallies around Frank, who is hospitalized with chest pain.
episodes.title: Betrayal
